Class Main

java.lang.Object
Main
class Main
extends java.lang.Object
Used to run the game
Author:
Nathan Taylor, Destin Byrd

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Main()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static boolean fight​(Hero h, Enemy e)
    Plays out one turn of the fight Initiates the player's attack method then, if the enemy is not defeated, the enemy retaliates with their attack method If the enemy is defeated by player's attack, the enemy drops their item for the player to pick up If the player's HP drops to zero, the game ends
    static void itemRoom​(Hero h, Map m)
    Called when the player encounters a room containing an item Generates a random item that the player picks up if their inventory is not full If the player decides not to pick up the item, the item is left on the map.
    static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
    Running the game, allowing the player to move around the map and interact with whatever the player encounters (item on the ground to pick up, an enemy to fight, etc.)
    static boolean monsterRoom​(Hero h, Map m, int level)
    Called whenever the player enters a room with a monster Continuously gives the player the option of attacking, running away, or if the player has a health potion, drinking the potion, until the player dies, defeats the enemy, or runs away
    static void store​(Hero h)
    Gives the user the option to purchase items or to sell items from their inventory

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Main

      Main()

  • Method Details

    • store

      public static void store​(Hero h)
      Gives the user the option to purchase items or to sell items from their inventory
      Parameters:
      h - The player object

    • monsterRoom

      public static boolean monsterRoom​(Hero h, Map m, int level)
      Called whenever the player enters a room with a monster Continuously gives the player the option of attacking, running away, or if the player has a health potion, drinking the potion, until the player dies, defeats the enemy, or runs away
      Parameters:
      h - The player object
      m - The level map
      level - The level the player is option
      Returns:
      True if the player survives and false if the player is defeated

    • fight

      public static boolean fight​(Hero h, Enemy e)
      Plays out one turn of the fight Initiates the player's attack method then, if the enemy is not defeated, the enemy retaliates with their attack method If the enemy is defeated by player's attack, the enemy drops their item for the player to pick up If the player's HP drops to zero, the game ends
      Parameters:
      h - The player object
      e - The enemy object the player is fighting
      Returns:
      True if the player defeats the enemy, false otherwise

    • itemRoom

      public static void itemRoom​(Hero h, Map m)
      Called when the player encounters a room containing an item Generates a random item that the player picks up if their inventory is not full If the player decides not to pick up the item, the item is left on the map. If the player picks up the item, the item is removed from the map
      Parameters:
      h - The player object picking up the item in the room
      m - The player's map passed in so that we can remove the item from the map if needed

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      Running the game, allowing the player to move around the map and interact with whatever the player encounters (item on the ground to pick up, an enemy to fight, etc.)
      Parameters:
      args - Arguments unused
